fields.faq:
1. What is included in the Scenic Day Trip from Rome?
    The trip includes private bus transport from Rome to Sorrento, a ferry ride to Positano, a guided tour of the Amalfi Coast, and time to explore Sorrento and Positano. You’ll also have the option to enjoy an Amalfi Coast boat tour and shop at Positano shops and boutiques.
  2. How long is the trip?
    The entire trip typically lasts a full day, with travel time from Rome to Sorrento, Positano, and the Amalfi Coast, including time for sightseeing, shopping, and relaxation along the coast.
  3. Is lunch included in the tour?No, lunch is not included, but you will have plenty of opportunities to dine at seaside cafes in Sorrento and Positano, where you can try local delicacies.
  4. Can I swim during the trip?
    Yes, there will be time for you to swim and enjoy the beautiful beaches of Positano and the Amalfi Coast during your visit.
  5. What should I bring on the trip?
    We recommend bringing comfortable walking shoes, swimwear, sunscreen, and a camera to capture the stunning coastal views and Sorrento views. 
  6. Are there opportunities for shopping?
    Yes, Positano is known for its boutiques where you can shop for items like leather sandals, clothing, and souvenirs. You’ll have time to explore and shop in the village.
  7. Is the tour suitable for families with young children?
    Yes, infant seats are available, and the tour is designed to be accessible for families. However, it's important to note that the trip involves some walking and a ferry ride, so ensure your little ones are comfortable with travel.
  8. How do I get from Rome to the Amalfi Coast?
    The trip begins with private bus travel from Piazzale Flaminio in Rome to Sorrento, followed by a ferry ride to Positano and other coastal towns.
  9. What is the cancellation policy?
    The tour offers free cancellation with flexible reservations, so you can cancel or modify your booking within the specified period.
  10. Is tipping included in the price?
    No, tipping is not included, but it is customary to tip your guide and driver if you feel they provided excellent service.

fields.description:
Do you offer guided tours across Europe?
Yes, we do! We offer guided tours not only in Italy but also across various destinations in Europe, including Switzerland, Germany, France, and more. Feel free to contact us for customized options or check out our available tours on our website!
Are your tours suitable for families?
Yes, our tours are family-friendly and suitable for all ages!
Can I customize my Europe travel itinerary?
Yes, we offer customizable Europe travel itineraries to fit your preferences!
Do your tours include flights and accommodation?
No, our tours typically include activities and transportation at the destination, but flights and accommodation are not included unless specified.
Are there any discounts for group bookings?
Yes, we offer special discounts for group bookings. Feel free to contact us for details!
Are meals included in your tour packages?
Meals are included in some tours, but not all. Please check the tour details for specific inclusions.
How early should I book my tour package?
It's best to book your tour package at least a few weeks in advance to secure your preferred dates and availability.
Are your tours suitable for seniors?
Yes, our tours are suitable for seniors and can be adjusted for comfort and ease.
Do your day trips include transportation?
Yes, our day trips usually include transportation. Please check the specific tour details for confirmation.
Are your tours child-friendly?
Absolutely! Our tours are designed to be child-friendly and enjoyable for the whole family.
Are taxes and entrance fees included in the price?
Yes, taxes and entrance fees are included in the tour price unless otherwise stated.
Do your tours run year-round or seasonally?
Our tours run year-round, with some seasonal variations depending on the destination.
Are pets allowed on any of your tours?
Pets are generally not allowed on our tours to ensure everyones safety and comfort.
